briefdescription.para: Construct a new color ramp button.

detaileddescription.para: Use parent to attach a parent QWidget to the dialog. Use dialogTitle string to define the title to show in the color ramp dialog

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the button accepts live updates from QgsColorRampDialog.

simplesect.para: true if the button will be accepted immediately when the dialog's color ramp changes

briefdescription.para: Returns a copy of the current color ramp.
Returns the title for the color ramp dialog window.

simplesect.para: title for the color ramp dialog

briefdescription.para: Returns the name of the current color ramp when it's available in the style manager.
Returns the context string for the color ramp button.

detaileddescription.para:
The context string is passed to all color ramp preview icons shown in the button's drop-down menu, to (eventually) allow them to customize their display colors based on the context.
context context string for the color dialog button's color ramp preview icons
setContext

briefdescription.para: Returns a copy of the default color ramp for the button, which is shown in the button's drop-down menu for the "default color ramp" option.

simplesect.para: default color ramp for the button. Returns a null pointer if the default color ramp option is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the current color is null.
Returns true if the current color is null.
Sets whether the button accepts live updates from QgsColorRampDialog.

detaileddescription.para:
Live updates may cause changes that are not undoable on QColorRampDialog cancel.
accept
set to true to enable live updates
acceptLiveUpdates

briefdescription.para: Set the title for the color ramp dialog window.

parameterdescription.para: Title for the color ramp dialog

briefdescription.para: Sets the name of the current color ramp when it's available in the style manager.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the saved color ramp

briefdescription.para: Sets the context string for the color ramp button.

detaileddescription.para:
The context string is passed to all color ramp preview icons shown in the button's drop-down menu, to (eventually) allow them to customize their display colors based on the context.
context
context string for the color dialog button's color ramp preview icons
context

briefdescription.para: Sets the default color ramp for the button, which is shown in the button's drop-down menu for the "default color ramp" option.

parameterdescription.para: default color ramp for the button. Set to a null pointer to disable the default color ramp option. The ramp will be cloned and ownership is not transferred.

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the color ramp button only shows gradient type ramps.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to show only gradient type ramps

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the drop-down menu should be shown for the button.

detaileddescription.para:
The default behavior is to show the menu.
showMenu
set to false to hide the drop-down menu
showMenu

briefdescription.para: Sets whether a set to null (clear) option is shown in the button's drop-down menu.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to show a null option

briefdescription.para: Sets whether a random colors option is shown in the button's drop-down menu.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to show a random colors option

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the color ramp button only shows gradient type ramps.
Returns whether the drop-down menu is shown for the button.

simplesect.para: true if drop-down menu is shown

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the set to null (clear) option is shown in the button's drop-down menu.
Returns whether random colors option is shown in the button's drop-down menu.
Sets the background pixmap for the button based upon current color ramp.

parameterdescription.para: Color ramp for button background. If no color ramp is specified, the button's current color ramp will be used

briefdescription.para: Sets the current color ramp for the button.

detaileddescription.para:
Will emit a colorRampChanged() signal if the color ramp is different to the previous color ramp.
colorramp
New color ramp for the button. The ramp will be cloned and ownership is not transferred.
setRandomColorRamp, setColorRampFromName, colorRamp

briefdescription.para: Sets the current color ramp for the button using a saved color ramp name.

detaileddescription.para:
Will emit a colorRampChanged() signal if the color ramp is different to the previous color ramp.
name
Name of saved color ramp
setColorRamp, setRandomColorRamp, colorRamp

briefdescription.para: Sets the current color ramp for the button to random colors.

detaileddescription.para:
Will emit a colorRampChanged() signal if the color ramp is different to the previous color ramp.
setColorRamp, setColorRampFromName, colorRamp

briefdescription.para: Sets color ramp to the button's default color ramp, if set.
Sets color ramp to null.
Emitted whenever a new color ramp is set for the button.

detaileddescription.para: The color ramp is always valid. In case the new color ramp is the same, no signal is emitted to avoid infinite loops.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new color ramp.
Inverts the current color ramp.
Load a color ramp from a menu entry.
Creates the drop-down menu entries.
Creates a new color ramp.
Show a color ramp dialog based on the ramp type.
Reimplemented to detect right mouse button clicks on the color ramp button.
Create a color ramp icon for display in the drop-down menu.

parameterdescription.para: Color ramp to create an icon from

briefdescription.para: A cross platform button subclass for selecting color ramps.

detaileddescription.para:
Will open color ramp dialogs when clicked. Offers live updates to button from color ramp dialog. An attached drop-down menu allows for access to saved color ramps, as well as option to invert the current color ramp and create new ramps.
QGIS 3.0
